name: FitFuel
description:
FitFuel is your FREE all-in-one fitness and meal planner designed to keep you motivated every single day. Whether you want to lose weight, gain muscle, or just stay healthy, FitFuel makes it simple and fun.

⭐ Key Features:

🎂 Personalized setup: Enter your birthday & goals to get custom workouts and meals.

🏋️ Daily workout schedule: Chest Day, Leg Day, Cardio & more.

🥗 Meal planner: Easy recipes and balanced nutrition suggestions.

⏱ Workout timer: Track your sets and rest times.

💧 Water counter: Stay hydrated with daily tracking.

🔥 Streak system: Build consistency and unlock motivational badges.

📅 Workout calendar: Never miss a day — stay on track.

📩 Smart reminders: Missed a session? Get a push message like “Don’t miss Leg Day!”

FitFuel keeps fitness simple, fun, and motivating. No complicated subscriptions — it’s 100% free.

Why Choose FitFuel?
Unlike boring fitness apps, FitFuel makes workouts exciting by turning your progress into streaks, challenges, and rewards. You’ll stay consistent, motivated, and healthier — all while having fun.

👉 Download FitFuel today and start your journey to a stronger, healthier you!
